h2.a: Welcome to KIPP Indy Public Schools

div.p: KIPP Indy Public Schools is a nonprofit network of college-preparatory, public charter schools educating students in elementary, middle, and high school for success in college and life.
Our goal is to help students develop the knowledge, skills, and character strengths they need to succeed throughout their education and in the competitive world beyond.

h4.strong: We are now enrolling Grades K-10 for the 2020-21 school year!
Click here to complete your application to join our Team & Family!
Don’t wait! Seats are limited and will fill up fast!
